snippet: The fate of Oral Nicholas Hillary, who is accused of killing Garrett Phillips, the 12-year-old son of Mr. Hillary’s former girlfriend, now rests with Judge Felix J. Catena....
abstract: Lawyers for prosecution and defense lay out closing arguments in trial of Oral Nicholas Hillary, who is accused of murdering Garrett Phillips, 12-year-old son of his former girlfriend Tandy Cyrus in 2011; defense calls prosecution's case 'torn and tattered quilt' while prosecution points to inconsistencies in Hillary’s statements that suggest he is lying about his role in Phillips' death.
